paper_abstract: In this paper, a novel approach is proposed to determine the electronic system components of a smart clothing system design developed for blinds. The integration of diverse components which are developed and produced by different technologies and materials is a major challenge in a smart clothing system technology. Therefore, an integrated methodology based on fuzzy analytic hierarchy process (AHP) and fuzzy information axiom is used for the solution of this problem.
paper_title: Developing a Smart Clothing System for Blinds Based on Information Axiom
